title: Monetary Policy Transmission through the Lens of the RBA's Models
excerpt: This paper explains how the monetary policy transmission mechanism works in the RBA's DSGE and macro-econometric models. We also benchmark those models' IRFs against non-RBA models.
citation: Mulqueeney, J., Ballantyne, A, and Hambur, J. (2025). "Monetary Policy Transmission through the Lens of the RBA's models". RBA Bulletin.
